tasks.title: Configure Email System and Domain Infrastructure
tasks.description: Set up professional email system for moduloria.com including Google Workspace accounts, email signatures, and auto-responders for brand-consistent communication.
tasks.details:
Implementation steps:

1. **Domain Configuration (moduloria.com)**:
   - Verify domain ownership in Google Admin Console
   - Configure MX records for email routing
   - Set up SPF, DKIM, and DMARC records for deliverability

2. **Google Workspace Setup** (Alternative: Microsoft 365 or Zoho Mail):
   - Create accounts: contacto@moduloria.com, hola@moduloria.com, nicolas@moduloria.com
   - Configure aliases for support@ and info@
   - Set storage quotas and sharing policies

3. **Email Signatures**:
   - Create HTML signature template with brand colors (#1a1f36 primary, #d4a574 copper accent)
   - Include: Name, Role, Phone (+45-5280-1394), Website, LinkedIn, Legal disclaimer
   - Use tools like Wisestamp or HubSpot Signature Generator

4. **Auto-responders**:
   - Business hours acknowledgment with 24h response commitment
   - Out-of-office template for vacations
   - Lead capture response with Calendly link

5. **Email Templates** (save in Google Docs/Notion):
   - Initial response template (confirm receipt + next steps)
   - Proposal submission template
   - Follow-up sequence (Day 2, Day 5, Day 10)

**Cost estimate**: Google Workspace Business Starter ~‚Ç¨6/user/month
tasks.testStrategy: Send test emails from each account to external addresses. Verify emails arrive without spam flags. Test signature rendering in Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail. Confirm auto-responders trigger correctly. Run SPF/DKIM validation using mail-tester.com with target score >9/10.

tasks.title: Set Up N8N Automation Infrastructure
tasks.description: Install and configure N8N self-hosted or cloud instance with initial demo workflows for form submissions, WhatsApp bot, and OCR processing to demonstrate MVP capabilities.
tasks.details:
Implementation steps:

1. **N8N Installation** (Choose one):
   - **Option A - Self-hosted (Docker)**:
     ```bash
     docker run -d --name n8n -p 5678:5678 -v n8n_data:/home/node/.n8n n8nio/n8n
     ```
   - **Option B - N8N Cloud**: Sign up at n8n.cloud (free tier: 5 workflows)
   - Configure subdomain: n8n.moduloria.com or use cloud URL

2. **API Keys Configuration**:
   - OpenAI API: GPT-4o-mini for text processing (~‚Ç¨0.15/1000 tokens)
   - Whisper API: Audio transcription (~‚Ç¨0.006/min)
   - Google Vision API: OCR processing (free tier: 1000 requests/month)
   - WhatsApp Business API via Twilio or Wati (evaluate: Twilio sandbox free for testing)

3. **Demo Workflow 1 - Web Form to CRM**:
   - Webhook trigger receives form data from website
   - Create entry in Airtable/Notion
   - Send confirmation email via Gmail node
   - Notify via Slack/WhatsApp

4. **Demo Workflow 2 - WhatsApp FAQ Bot**:
   - Twilio/Wati webhook receives message
   - OpenAI node classifies intent and generates response
   - Send reply via WhatsApp
   - Log conversation in Airtable

5. **Demo Workflow 3 - OCR Invoice Processing**:
   - File upload trigger (email attachment or webhook)
   - Google Vision OCR extraction
   - GPT-4 structured data parsing (invoice number, date, amount, vendor)
   - Save to Airtable with extracted fields

6. **Export Workflows**:
   - Save as .json files for version control and client delivery
   - Document each workflow with README

**Monthly cost estimate**: ‚Ç¨50-200 (APIs + optional cloud hosting)
tasks.testStrategy: Test each workflow end-to-end with sample data. Verify form submission creates correct CRM entry. Send WhatsApp messages and confirm bot responses are appropriate. Upload test invoices and verify OCR extraction accuracy >95%. Monitor N8N execution logs for errors. Test error handling when APIs fail.

tasks.title: Create MVP Selection and Technical Specification
tasks.description: Analyze the 3 candidate problems (#01 Email Classification, #08 Tool Tracking QR, #12 Change Orders) and select the optimal MVP based on demand validation, technical feasibility, and demonstrable ROI.
tasks.details:
Implementation steps:

1. **Evaluation Matrix Creation**:
   - Criteria (weight 1-5):
     - Technical complexity (lower = better) - Weight: 4
     - Implementation time (faster = better) - Weight: 5
     - ROI demonstrability (higher = better) - Weight: 5
     - Market validation potential - Weight: 4
     - Reusability for other clients - Weight: 3

2. **Candidate Analysis**:
   - **#01 Email Classification** (‚Ç¨1.5K-3K/month):
     - Tech: N8N + OpenAI + Gmail API
     - Time: 3-5 days
     - Complexity: Low
     - Demo potential: High (instant visual results)
   - **#08 Tool Tracking QR** (‚Ç¨5.2K-10.4K/month):
     - Tech: QR codes + WhatsApp + Airtable
     - Time: 1-2 weeks
     - Complexity: Low-Medium
     - Demo potential: Very High (physical + digital)
   - **#12 Change Orders** (‚Ç¨18K-33K/month):
     - Tech: Airtable + N8N + WhatsApp approval flow
     - Time: 2-3 weeks
     - Complexity: Medium
     - Demo potential: High (clear before/after)

3. **Validation Conversations**:
   - Contact 5-7 target companies from prospect list
   - Script: 'Investigating main operational challenges in construction'
   - Document: Which problem resonates most? What would they pay?

4. **Technical Specification Document**:
   - Selected MVP problem
   - Detailed workflow diagram (use Mermaid or draw.io)
   - API integrations required
   - Data schema design
   - User journey map
   - Edge cases and error handling
   - Acceptance criteria (Definition of Done)

5. **Recommendation Report**:
   - Executive summary (1 page)
   - Evaluation matrix results
   - Recommendation with justification
   - Implementation timeline
   - Resource requirements

**Recommendation**: Start with #01 Email Classification or #08 Tool Tracking due to fastest time-to-value and high visual impact.
tasks.testStrategy: Present evaluation matrix to 2-3 trusted advisors for feedback. Validate technical spec with prototype sketch before full development. Confirm API rate limits and costs don't exceed budget. Verify selected MVP can be demoed in under 5 minutes. Test documentation clarity by having someone unfamiliar build from spec.

   - Google Maps searches: 'construcci√≥n modular [ciudad]'
   - Industry directories: SEOPAN, C√°maras de Comercio

2. **Prospect Database Structure** (in Notion):
   - Company: Name, Website, LinkedIn page, Location, Size estimate
   - Contact: Name, Title, Email, Phone, LinkedIn profile
   - Qualification: ICP fit score (A/B/C), Pain points identified, Budget estimate

   - Tier C (30%): Possible fit, requires more research

5. **Outreach Templates**:

Measure LinkedIn acceptance rate (target: >30%). Confirm CRM correctly tracks all touchpoints. Review prospect quality with ICP criteria after first 25 entries.

tasks.title: Implement Pilot Program with First Client
tasks.description: Execute full pilot implementation with one qualified client including technical setup, onboarding, 30-day measurement period, and case study documentation.
tasks.details:
Implementation steps:

1. **Client Selection Criteria**:
   - ICP match: Construction modular company, 10-100 employees
   - Technical readiness: Uses WhatsApp, has smartphone access, basic digital literacy
   - Commitment: Willing to provide feedback weekly, agree to testimonial
   - Access: Will share necessary data/systems for implementation
   - Timeline: Available to start within 2 weeks

2. **Pilot Agreement**:
   - Duration: 30 days active use
   - Pricing: 70% discount vs standard (‚Ç¨900-1,500 for implementation)
   - Commitments from client:
     - Weekly 15-min feedback call
     - Video testimonial at end (if satisfied)
     - Permission to use as case study (anonymized if preferred)
   - Commitments from ModulorIA:
     - Dedicated support (WhatsApp, email)
     - All fixes within 24h
     - Full documentation and training

3. **Implementation Phase** (Week 1-2):
   - Day 1-2: Kickoff call, requirements confirmation, access setup
   - Day 3-5: Technical implementation (N8N, Airtable, WhatsApp)
   - Day 6-7: Internal testing with mock data
   - Day 8-10: User onboarding, training session (recorded)
   - Day 11-14: Soft launch with real data, intensive support

4. **Measurement Phase** (Week 3-6):
   - Daily: Monitor system usage and errors
   - Weekly: Feedback call (15 min)
     - What's working well?
     - What's frustrating?
     - Specific improvement suggestions?
   - Track KPIs: Time saved, errors prevented, user adoption rate

5. **Case Study Documentation**:
   - Before state: Hours spent, error rate, pain description
   - Implementation: Solution overview, timeline, effort
   - After state: Metrics improvement, user quotes
   - ROI calculation: Actual savings vs projection
   - Testimonial: Video (2-3 min) + written quote

6. **Post-Pilot**:
   - Present results report to client
   - Propose continuation (retainer or additional automations)
   - Publish case study (with permission)
   - LinkedIn post announcing success
tasks.testStrategy: Confirm pilot agreement signed before starting technical work. Track all support requests and resolution times. Measure baseline metrics before go-live. Weekly KPI review vs targets. Client satisfaction survey at Day 15 and Day 30 (target NPS >8). Record testimonial within 1 week of pilot end. Document all learnings for MVP v2 improvements.

tasks.title: Document Operational Playbooks
tasks.description: Create comprehensive playbook documents for repeatable processes: Client Audit, Quick Win Implementation, Content Creation, and Lead Management workflows.
tasks.details:
Implementation steps:

1. **Playbook Format Standard**:
   - Template in Notion with sections:
     - Purpose & When to Use
     - Prerequisites
     - Step-by-Step Process (numbered, with screenshots)
     - Checklists
     - Templates/Assets Used
     - Common Issues & Solutions
     - Time Estimate
   - Video walkthrough embedded (Loom)

2. **Playbook 1: Client Audit Process**:
   - Pre-call preparation (research, questions list)
   - Discovery call agenda (60-90 min)
   - Key questions to ask
   - Note-taking template
   - Post-call analysis framework
   - Deliverable: Audit report generation
   - Follow-up sequence

3. **Playbook 2: Quick Win Implementation**:
   - Client kickoff checklist
   - Technical requirements gathering
   - Environment setup steps
   - Development standards
   - Testing protocol
   - Client UAT process
   - Go-live checklist
   - Handoff documentation

4. **Playbook 3: Content Creation**:
   - Content ideation process
   - Research and outline
   - Writing guidelines (tone, length, structure)
   - Design asset creation (Canva workflow)
   - Review and approval
   - Publishing and distribution
   - Engagement follow-up

5. **Playbook 4: Lead Management**:
   - Lead capture and entry
   - Qualification criteria (BANT or similar)
   - Initial outreach sequence
   - Meeting scheduling
   - CRM status updates
   - Follow-up cadence
   - Win/loss documentation

6. **Organization**:
   - Store all playbooks in Notion Wiki
   - Create quick-access dashboard
   - Version control with dates
   - Feedback mechanism for improvements

**Goal**: Any new team member can execute process independently using playbook
tasks.testStrategy: Have someone unfamiliar with process follow playbook end-to-end. Time actual execution vs estimated time. Identify gaps where questions arise. Test that all linked templates and assets are accessible. Verify video walkthroughs match current process. Update playbooks quarterly based on learnings.
